data.title: Get a 0116 area code phone number in Leicester
data.meta_description: Activate your 0116 business phone number in no-time and instantly use your Leicester number from any device: desktop, laptop or smartphone.
data.text:
Struggling with an outdated business telephone system? Our Cloud Hosted VoIP Telephone Systems offer all the features of a traditional phone system at lower cost, without the need to invest in expensive hardware. Save money while enjoying top-notch functionality!

With Cloud Hosted Telephone Systems, you won't incur any initial or setup charges and all management will be done over the internet. This gives you an economical telephone system solution with no extra costs!

About The UC Cloud Hosted VoIP Telephone System - 1 Users Package

This Package is for 1 Users and Includes :

FREE Unlimited UK Local, National & Mobile Minutes

FREE access to Apple & Android Mobile Applications

FREE Suite of Desktop Softphone Applications

FREE Technical Support from our UK based team

Porting of your existing telephone numbers to our Cloud Hosted VoIP Platform.

Over 200 cloud hosted telephone system features as standard

System Features:

Call Transfer

Hold Functionality

Day & Night Greetings

Personal Voicemail

Voicemail to Email

Auto Attendant

Conference Calling

Many More.....

* NOTE THIS PACKAGE IS A 12 MONTH SUBSCRIPTION ONLY* After 12 months you will have to renew your package to keep using your system.

If you want to establish a local presence and gain access to the population of over 552,000 people in Leicester, Queniborough, Ratby, Syston, Thurcaston, Tugby and surrounding areas, getting a Leicester phone number with a 0116 dialing code can be a smart move.

By using a local number, you can improve your business's credibility and attract potential customers who prefer to work with a company that has a local presence. Additionally, with The VoIP Shop virtual number service, you can easily set up and activate your 0116 phone number within minutes without needing a physical address in Leicester.

Step 1: Choose a VoIP provider that offers 0116 area code phone numbers, such as The VoIP Shop.

Step 2: Select a telephone number from the available options and complete the registration process.

Step 3: Set up your VoIP system and configure it to receive and make calls instantly from any desktop, laptop or mobile device.

Step 4: Utilize the advanced features available with your VoIP system, such as custom greetings, IVR, call forwarding, call recording, and more, to enhance your business operations.

Step 5: Promote your new 0116 STD code phone number on your website, marketing materials, and social media channels to establish a local presence and attract new customers in Leicester and the surrounding areas.

If you need to call a Leicester phone number from overseas, follow these five simple steps:

Enter the Exit code from your country, which is 00.

Enter the Country code or ISD Code for the United Kingdom, which is 44.

Enter the area code for Leicester, omitting the first zero: 116.

Dial the phone number of the person or business you wish to reach.

Here's an example of a full phone number to dial: 00 44 116 2438426 or +44 116 2438426 .

By following these steps, you can easily connect with individuals and businesses in Leicester from anywhere in the world.

To call a Leicester phone number from within the UK, follow these simple steps:

Dial the area code for Leicester with first zero (0116).

Dial the phone number of the person or business you wish to reach.

That's it - you don't need to enter a country code or any other special digits.

Here's an example of a full phone number to dial: 0116 2438426 or +44 116 2438426.

Following these steps, you can easily connect with individuals and businesses in Leicester from within the UK without additional dialing codes or prefixes.
